body.name: L-Shaped Gaming Desk with Hutch, Monitor Stands, Storage Shelves, LED Lights & Power Outlets - 94.5 inch Reversible Black Corner Computer Desk for Home Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 17 hrs 24 mins
features: 💏[Corner Desk or Two-Person Table] Our home office desk has four assembly options, you can choose to assemble into an L-shaped computer desk or a 94.5” long computer desk according to your own needs. The corner desk fits perfectly in the corner, making it ideal for small rooms. The 94.5 inch long computer desk allows you to share a workspace with your children, friends or colleagues, creating more opportunities for interaction.

😘[Monitor Stand] The monitor stands on this computer desk can be moved anywhere on the edge of the desktop. It is easy to install and remove to save more space. The height of the monitor stand keeps the computer at eye level, elevating your vision and protecting your cervical spine.

⭐[L-Shaped Desk with LED light] The L-shaped gaming desk features RGB LED lights with 20 Static Colors, 23 Dynamic Modes, 8 Brightness Grades, and 9 Speed Grades to create a pleasant atmosphere and outline the world a more happy. The L gaming desk included LED control was fixed and suspended from the power cord to avoid losing it.

🙌[Bulited-In Charging Port] Our L gaming desk comes equipped with 4 Outlets & 2 USB Ports, allowing you to provide power for up to 6 devices simultaneously. The power outlet allows you to charge laptops, smartphones, tablets, and more. With the bulited-in power outlet, you can connect all your electronic devices neatly without worrying about tangled wires. This enhances work efficiency while keeping your desktop clean.

🥳[ABUNDANT STORAGE CAPACITY] The storage shelf above the computer desk can hold books, documents and other items. The underside of the desktop also features height-adjustable shelves for all heights of hosts. The L-shaped desk with shelves and hutch also has 2 headphone hooks on the side, leaving plenty of room for studying, working, playing games and other family activities.

🥰[Easy Assembly & After-Sales Support] We have clearly labeled all the parts and the table can be put together exactly as described without any trouble. Your satisfaction is our top priority, if you have any concerns or questions, please feel free to contact us, we will give you a satisfactory response within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to follow instructions.
reviews.reviewText: Instructions are easy to follow. Every piece is well labeled. I'm not a very strong person, but was able to assemble this easily. Very sturdy, was very surprised and am very excited to hook my gaming system up on it. LEDs work, if yours don't flip the plug around and it should work. Plugged mine in backwards at first!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together- looks good
reviews.reviewText: Great desk for the price-Easy to assemble, perfect for what we needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this desk so far. The hutch is decently sized with a streamlined design, and it fits perfectly in the corner of my bedroom. Easy enough to assemble, but a LOT of parts/screws that are a pain in the ass. However, I've already gotten compliments on it! My only complaint is that it's a bit rickety. Definitely sturdy enough to handle all my gear... just don't bump it too hard or heavily lean on it constantly. For anyone wanting to put their computer tower on the built-in stand near the floor: I have the Corsair Crystal 280X RGB Micro-ATX Case (see photo). It's a fraction of the size of standard cases and it fits perfectly in this desk, so the shelf is pretty narrow/low. You may want to check the dimensions for your build. Overall, happy with the purchase. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great desk bigger than I thought
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to put together. The light is cool. The great thing is that there's so much room under the desk it fits perfectly there. With the video and the manual, the assembly is simple. 1 hour can be done. If you have an electric screwdriver at home, I suggest using it. The assembly time will be very short and the whole process will be easier. Overall it was perfect and suited my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The whole desk is junk, nothing is square, nothing goes together how it's suppose to. Screws don't fit, holes are stripped, led lights don't stick! Complete waste of money ans time! Not even a 1 star but won't let me leave it blank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reversible L-Shaped Desk
reviews.reviewText: This desk is absolutely my favorite workspace. The LED lights are a very nice touch since most of the desks Ive ever seen don't have that. The desk is easy to build and the instructions to me were dime to follow. It is very stable and quickly became my favorite place to sit and do my work because I was able to personalize my space better with the inclusion of the hutch. It makes my space feel so much more inviting. I definitely recommend this for anyone who spends a lengthy amount of time sitting at a desk, even gamers willvrnjoy the aesthetic this desk brings with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spacious and Looks Great
reviews.reviewText: I love this desk!! So spacious and I appreciate the details here like the variety of orientation options, the addition of LED lights that are optional to add, the included power outlet with cutout, the cabinet on the side has two height options, the included optional monitor stand and even hooks to hang your headphones or something else. The wood is good quality and looks very nice.Building - It is fairly easy to build, just takes some patience. I was able to make it by myself with no extra tools except what was provided. Just read the manual and look at the pictures carefully and all the pieces are numbered for ease. There wasn't an installation video when I built it, but looks like there is one now! There was perhaps one step where the item might've been switched or I got confused but it was easy to figure out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good corner desk
reviews.reviewText: I needed to fill a specific space and this fit the bill. I like the size of the desk and the shelves above. Complaints would be not being able to hook anything to the side of the desk where the shelves are due to a metal bar along the bottom and the lights and how they hook up/are used. I wish they worked with an app but instead they have a tiny remote.
